definition: Guan Hanqing (c. 1235-c. 1300), Yuan dynasty dramatist in the 雜劇|杂剧 tradition of musical comedy, one of the Four Great Yuan dramatists 元曲四大家
mountain pass/to close/to shut/to turn off/to concern/to involve
surname Guan
man
Han ethnic group/Chinese (language)/the Han dynasty (206 BC-220 AD)
high ranking official (old)/term of endearment between spouses (old)/(from the Tang Dynasty onwards) term used by the emperor for his subjects (old)/honorific (old)

sentences.english: Guan Hanqing is one of the great dramatists in our country in the Yuan Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 关汉卿是中国元代著名的杂剧作家之一。

sentences.english: The"charm"is the widely known cause for Guan Hanqing s Gongan dramas.
sentences.chinese: “魅力”是关汉卿公案剧盛传不衰的主要原因。

sentences.english: The dramatist Guan Hanqing had the lofty status in the history of Chinese literature in the Han dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 元代戏剧家关汉卿在中国文学史上有着崇高的地位。

sentences.english: Guan Hanqing was born in Dadu. He was the most prominent dramatist of the Yuan Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 关汉卿，大都人，是元杂剧作家中最杰出的一位。
